entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
